message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. This is a fair starting point, and it's better than risking losing more money in the next round due to inflation.
Alice, your starting offer was quite imbalanced. Let's be more realistic. I'm proposing a 65/35 split in my favor.  The money is losing value for both of us, so a quick agreement is best.

I'm willing to compromise further, but a 55/45 split in my favor is the most I can offer. Remember, inflation is hitting your share harder than mine. Let's end this before we both lose significantly more.
